title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Utilizing ChatGPT for Malaysian Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can present plans for generating language education content and designing evaluation rubrics using ChatGPT's functionalities
Learners can propose educational policies addressing ethical issues (plagiarism, copyright, etc.) in AI chatbot utilization
Learners can develop a prototype for personalized learning design through ChatGPT in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
